memorize.jabToStart: Put your gloves on and throw a jab to start
memorize.infoText: You will have on the screen a punch type, you will have to hit the right punch. If correct you'll have a punch added to the one before, it's quick so you have to be focused. As you keep getting the combinations correct more punches will be added till you reach a 10 punch combination.

accuracy.title: Accuracy Game
accuracy.jabToStart: Put your gloves on and throw a jab to start
accuracy.infoText: You will see a punch type on the screen. You must hit the correct punch as quickly as possible before the timer runs out. Each time you get it right, the time to react gets shorter. Complete 10 punches in a row to win!

tutorialP.title: Boxing Tutorial
tutorialP.intro1: Welcome! This tutorial will teach you the basics of boxing and how to use Sparx.
tutorialP.stanceText: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hands up to protect your face.
tutorialP.jabText: The jab is a quick, straight punch with your lead hand. Extend your arm and snap it back.
tutorialP.crossText: The cross is a powerful straight punch with your rear hand. Rotate your hips and shoulders as you punch.
tutorialP.leftHookText: The left hook is a punch thrown in a semi-circular motion with your lead hand.
tutorialP.rightHookText: The right hook is a punch thrown in a semi-circular motion with your rear hand.
tutorialP.leftUppercutText: The left uppercut is a punch thrown upward with your lead hand.
tutorialP.rightUppercutText: The right uppercut is a punch thrown upward with your rear hand.
tutorialP.jabCrossText: Combine the jab and cross for a quick one-two combination.
tutorialP.soundsText: Sparx uses sounds to help you keep rhythm and know when to punch.
tutorialP.tripleTapText: A triple tap sound means it's time to start punching!
tutorialP.tripleBellText: A triple bell sound signals the end of a round.
tutorialP.endText: That's it! You're ready to start training with Sparx. Good luck!
